newsitem.title: JAPAN: Foreigners, trust banks big yen bond buyers in Sept.
newsitem.headline: Foreigners, trust banks big yen bond buyers in Sept.

text.p: Foreigners and Japanese trust banks were the main net buyers of yen bonds in September, the Japan Securities Dealers' Association (JSDA) said on Monday.
But overall sales by banks as a whole, including city and long-term credit banks, agricultural financial institutions and credit unions, exceeded net buying by trust banks alone, it said.
The figures include Japanese government bonds, notes and Treasury bills, corporate bonds and bank debentures.
